channel.title: Export Dashboard to pdf
channel.description:
Hello Dear Community,
I saw the old post about the fact that if there will be possibilities to generate a dashboard in pdf, but I did not find any solutions apart from the selinum option which is quite complicated.
I would like to know if there will be any news and suggestions on this subject.
Thank you.
